product_name: NiteRider Stinger USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: Whether you're out for a quick spin around the block or a long ride into twilight, the NiteRider Stinger USB rear bike light helps you be seen with a highly visible 0.5-watt LED. Modern styling blends with your sleek road machine to your fender-adorned commuter bike and all styles in between. Internal lithium ion battery can be charged from the USB port of your computer, making charging at the office a snap; 1.75 hr. maximum charge time. NiteRider Stinger USB rear bike light offers steady high, steady low and flash modes, and fits round and aero seat posts.
short_description: Whether you're out for a quick spin around the block or a long ride into twilight, the NiteRider Stinger USB rear bike light helps you be seen with a highly visible 0.5-watt LED.
